name: Obstacle Runner
description:
A fun game where you have to avoid obstacles on a platform. This is just the first version of the game. A lot of cool updates are coming very soon, so stay tuned and make sure to give feedback in the comments below, so that the game gets improved in the future.  Also, in the future mobile platforms will be supported as well such as iOS and Android. Make sure to donate if you can, that would help me out a lot. Hope you guys enjoy it.  :D

Releases: * Version 1.0: - Initial release, might contain bugs. * Version 1.1: - A bug fix where the pause button is accessible at the start of the level even when not visible.
